name: stalemate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a situation in which neither group involved in an argument can win or get an advantage and no action can be taken: Tomorrow's meeting between the two leaders is expected to break a diplomatic stalemate that has lasted for ten years. Despite long discussions, the workers and the management remain locked in stalemate.
in chess, a position in which one player is unable to move, but their king is not being attacked, which means that neither of the two players wins Compare
